itunes:title: Episode 301 - DB Sports Companion Show 08/08/18 - Special Guest Professional Gambler Raphael Esparza
title: Episode 301 - DB Sports Companion Show 08/08/18 - Special Guest Professional Gambler Raphael Esparza
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway run down the College Football Coaches Poll Top 25 and give their "Way Too Early Predictions" on the Playoffs and National Championship winner.  Special Guest Raphael Esparza joins to give his predictions and unique insight...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway run down the College Football Coaches Poll Top 25 and give their "Way Too Early Predictions" on the Playoffs and National Championship winner.  Special Guest Raphael Esparza joins to give his predictions and unique insight on what it's like being a professional gambler and his craziest stories of running the Sportsbook at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for 12 years. 

Buy Ross' New Book "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It"

https://www.amazon.com/When-Darkness-Falls-Doesnt-Catch/dp/0692096663/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1533268712&sr=1-1&keywords=when+darkness+falls+he+doesnt+catch+it
